// Cash Shop Database
// Contains the items sold in the ingame cash shop.
//
// Structure of Database:
// Type,ItemID,Price
//
// Type:
//    0: New
//    1: Hot
//    2: Limited
//    3: Rental
//    4: Gear
//    5: Buff
//    6: Heal
//    7: Other
//    8: Sale
//
// Price:
//    Item cost, in cash points (#CASHPOINTS).
//============================
//----------CashShop----------
//============================

//============================
